title: Triadological Simulation Learning for Academic English Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Reading and Writing Skills, Understanding of Fundamental Terminology in Academic Fields
context.additional_context: English proficiency enhancement linked to academic writing for medical/legal/technical professionals

learning_goals: Summarize core concepts from academic texts into structured wiki pages with over 80% accuracy
Complete two or more academic writing assignments through collaboration with peer learners in a VR simulation environment
Develop three or more strategies to automate the reading-thinking-writing process by applying a trialogical approach
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
